data.660acd66367a625fab0b6392 successMessageT: Great, they obviously didn't see this coming. Let's see how these two sing without the money.
data.660acdce1d2f7aa65505e066 description:
Hello. I have news, and it's not pleasant. How's that in Russian... А! Some powerful people are pressuring me because of what we arranged. Threatening me. I can't lose my position, understand?

The only option is to get the laptop back. Eliminate the unnecessary prying eyes at the Health Resort, and prepare a place to deliver the laptop to the right people. They said they'd contact you on their own. Good luck, soldier.
data.660acdce1d2f7aa65505e066 successMessageT: Good job. Hopefully there won't be any more problems. I think we really did go too far.
data.660acdce1d2f7aa65505e069: Reach the east wing of the Health Resort on Shoreline
data.660acf9b2392822f6e0dc0a5 description:
So you're here to earn my trust? You're beginning to understand Tarkov. That's commendable.

Sell our foreign friend some weapons. That way he'll realize that the sanctions have been lifted and he's made amends. Then bring me the laptop that his men have left at the Health Resort, and I'll look into what he was after.
data.660acf9b2392822f6e0dc0a5 successMessageT: This laptop is a fake. Someone made this whole story up on purpose. I'd say Peacekeeper should think about who might have set him up, but I think the whole of Tarkov was the target.
data.660acf9b2392822f6e0dc0a7: Locate and obtain The Unheard's laptop on Shoreline
data.660acfc12392822f6e0dc0b1 description: So Peacekeeper's figured out what needs to be done. He sent you? I hope he paid you well. Give me the laptop and we'll part amicably.
data.660acfc12392822f6e0dc0b1 failMessageText: Decided to hand over the laptop without a middleman? Cunning, aren't you? And cocky. I'm not gonna let that happen again. In any case, I do have something for you.
data.660acfc12392822f6e0dc0b1 successMessageT: That's great. Tell Peacekeeper he's forgiven but not forgotten.
data.660acfc12392822f6e0dc0b3: Locate and obtain The Unheard's laptop on Shoreline

data.6616a96a577801372605b602 description: Hey! Got an update on that locked room. Rumor has it the ex-USECs have been seen around there for a while. Maybe they know how to open the doors. The other question is, what happened to whoever was inside? Either they escaped or they are already dead. We should find out. See if you can find anything interesting there while you're at it.
data.6616a96a577801372605b602 successMessageT:
So it's empty inside. That's good: if there are no bodies, chances are the refugees are alive. You know about the superposition principle, right?
All right, back to the point. I looked through the drive. There was a password [bmV3ZGF3bi4u] with "important" written on it. I think you can figure it out.
data.6616a9a14df4f14a474c92ba: Locate and obtain the hard drive inside the cottage hideout on Lighthouse
data.663b75f01f52e8017dccea96: Locate and obtain the hard drive inside the cottage hideout on Lighthouse

data.662912ad882d410eb12cd807 description: Hey, so somebody managed to get into the lab and steal the information I need. He like downloaded it all, you know what I'm saying? Anyway, I need to find this asshole, but the blueberries are trying to make peace and friendship here. They're pissing me off, getting in my way. Why don't we get rid of them?
data.662912ad882d410eb12cd807 failMessageText: Why did I spend so much money on a bunch of crooked idiots?! You can see those blueberries from miles away, you can't miss them! Now we have no information because of you.
data.662912ad882d410eb12cd807 successMessageT: Yeah, I heard, we all did great. I'd like to see that European prick's face now, ha!
data.662912e4a2228f385c7a5b7d description: Morning. I sent my men to inspect the laboratory, but someone's gotten there first. They've destroyed all the useful data, those bastards! My men say that they must have copied it all to themselves. It's important to catch them, but Skier's rednecks are obstructing us. I'm counting on your help to rid the territories of criminal elements. Don't worry, you won't be working alone.
data.662912e4a2228f385c7a5b7d failMessageText: I am surprised and disappointed. The task was simple! Maybe I should reconsider my views on outside help.
data.662912e4a2228f385c7a5b7d successMessageT: Good job! By working together, we got rid of part of the problem.
data.66588c0c98194a5d26010197 description: Hello mercenary! Heard what happened at the Lighthouse? My sources tell me the local crime lords have had a big dispute with the Rogues, and they're looking all over the city and the outskirts for them. The task is to help these Rogues. Because disturbing the peace and order on my watch is forbidden. Understood?
data.66588c0c98194a5d26010197 successMessageT: A job well done. The city may sleep safe now.
data.66588c0c98194a5d260101a2: Locate and neutralize Tagilla in a single raid
data.66588c0c98194a5d260101a0: Locate and neutralize Sanitar in a single raid

data.6658a15615cbb1b2c6014d5b description:
Come on in, kid. Heard the news yet?

Looks like all manner of folk are paying social calls to that health resort now. Everybody wants a piece of action. The dimwits spooked them off of there. My hounds are telling me that they saw that group of misfits moving towards old reserve base. So now you gotta hurry there. Who knows when will this window of opportunity close.
data.6658a15615cbb1b2c6014d5b successMessageT:
Did you chop off all the heads of the hydra in one fell swoop? They did a good job on gathering like that, no doubt about it. Tarkov will be forever grateful to you.
And I keep my word: here is the promised reward.

data.665eeacf5d86b6c8aa03c79b description: We need to talk. Sanitar's goons have been prowling the shore area at nights. Obviously looking for something. Can't let it go unchecked. Scare them off while I try to find out what they're up to.
data.665eeacf5d86b6c8aa03c79b successMessageT: You fought them off? Excellent! I found out they're looking for Thirsty's hideout. He was the guy who used to always bring a double supply of water with him. I haven't seen him in a while, right after he mixed up with Skier. I guess it led to a bad end for him.
data.665eed28bdbf7b1f92394ecb: Eliminate Scavs in the time period of 22:00-07:00 on Shoreline
data.665eec1f5e47a79f8605565a description:
The Thirsty dude? You too?! Why are you all bringing him up all of a sudden?

Yeah, I worked with this guy. Сouldn't last five minutes without a drink. We made some good money with him back then. Always brought good loot, that guy. My respect to him. But he's been out of the game for a long time, at least in Tarkov.

I can give you a tip on where he dumped his extra supplies, but not for free. I'm looking for two tanks of propane right now. Why don't you find it for me, and then we'll talk about your guy?
data.665eec1f5e47a79f8605565a successMessageT: You got it? That's a good start. Now we can talk about Thirsty.
data.665eec4a4dfc83b0ed0a9dca description:
So, I keep my word. Before you, Sanitar was sniffing around that guy, too. But his business proposition was shite, so I didn't tell him anything. I'll tell you, but a bit later.

Here are some nice propane tanks for you. Yeah, the ones you brought. Now you have to stash them. One in the natural reserve, in the Scav bunker. The other at the Customs area, in the little store by the crossroads. Just make sure to not shoot the tanks, okay? If you finish the job, you'll get more info.
data.665eec4a4dfc83b0ed0a9dca successMessageT: You done? Very well. I'll give you a bonus for not bitching about the job. So, anyway, Thirsty used to hang around in the west wing of the Health Resort, in the basement. That was a long time ago, before the junkies got there. We cleaned that place out a long time ago, but maybe there's something left, I don't know. Check it out for yourself.
data.666057c94381b34642e07f09: Найти место закладки на локации Лес
data.66605b4a933179c4e3393fd5: Найти место закладки балона на локации Таможня
data.6661a14545909ae2e92ca2d5: Locate the specified stash spot on Woods
data.6661a18a12e8457716d59f5d: Locate the specified stash spot on Customs
data.665eeca45d86b6c8aa03c79d description:
Thank you for reaching out. I know you're investigating a certain person called Thirsty. Sanitar is investigating him as well, for a specific reason. He's always hunting for any information on TerraGroup's activities. Surely it's all connected.

If you can intercept the data first, bring it to me, I'll pay you handsomely. Besides, in my hands, it won't cause another disaster.
data.665eeca45d86b6c8aa03c79d successMessageT: Just a diary, nothing but that? Well, it could still prove valuable... That handwriting is terrible! It'll take a while to read it. Here's your reward.
data.6660785fc37356435d193ae4: Locate any information about Thirsty on Shoreline
data.66607896f2ea02201517c203: Obtain the information in Thirsty's hideout
data.665eeca92f7aedcc900b0437 description:
Hello again. I was able to extract some scraps of information about a certain drug from the diary you brought. The owner of the diary used it frequently. It's some sort of combat stimulant, I think you might be interested in it.

I can provide you with samples if you help me reproduce and test it. Here's a list of the items you'll need.
data.665eeca92f7aedcc900b0437 successMessageT: I was sure you'd be interested in this! Here are the results of the work.
data.6661a28be2cdba6a469447c7: Hand over the found in raid item: Adrenaline injector
data.6661a2ae387c59056c822add: Hand over the found in raid item: Bottle of OLOLO Multivitamins
data.6661a2bf4846fd2b6ba30f90: Hand over the found in raid item: Bottle of saline solution
data.66631489acf8442f8b05319f description: You've made a name for yourself, and I may have an assignment for someone like you. But before I do, I want to make sure you can tell who's an asset and who's a threat. It's simple, shoot the PMCs, but don't hurt my people. Understood?
data.66631489acf8442f8b05319f failMessageText: Doesn't seem like you're trying to keep my people safe. Turns out you're more of a liability than a benefit. If you want to work with me, you have to prove your worth.
data.6667193a41b0135d2df10fd9: Eliminate PMC operatives without killing Scavs
data.6663148ca9290f9e0806cca1 description: Well, you've proven you won't shoot indiscriminately. Recently, one of my men was poisoned on a mission and didn't even make it to the extraction point. We couldn't figure out what toxin caused his death. The guy went on a scouting trip to the white chalk circles. I need a more fresh sample and a tough employee who can survive the poisoning and make it back from the raid.
data.6663148ca9290f9e0806cca1 successMessageT: You survived the poisoning? Now I'll try to get some information from your blood samples and get in touch with the right people. Either way, you've already earned your reward.
data.666719fc7c5ae40e6adcf43e: Extract from the location with the "Unknown toxin" status effect
data.6663148ed7f171c4c20226c1 description: Hello. I have an errand for you. One of our people decided he could use my distribution lines on his own. It looks like our "entrepreneur" is marketing to cultists with souvenir figurines. Find them and bring them back, and I'll examine their insides.
data.6663148ed7f171c4c20226c1 successMessageT: Thanks. My suspicions have been confirmed. I hope you understand this job is not to be talked about.
data.666729738d4b7a9182ad4a89: Find a Ded Moroz figurine in raid
data.66672a99bf7a7a1fcee35af0: Find a Politician Mutkevich figurine in raid
data.66672b010cf940754acb3a83: Find a Killa figurine in raid
data.66672b3330d5ad1d58cc1e95: Find a Reshala figurine in raid
data.66672b7dd70d15a60bb41e04: Find a Ryzhy figurine in raid
data.6667306ec19fb654f22fa05a: Find a Scav figurine in raid
data.666730b475bbbbfd5049b7da: Find a Tagilla figurine in raid
data.666730f88db8c7927a859959: Find a Cultist figurine in raid
data.66673136b23cfc3ecab865d6: Find a Den figurine in raid
data.6663149196a9349baa021baa description: You remember my "entrepreneur"? I found him, he's one of the local gang bosses. Who? You don't need to know that. Your job is to go to each of them and remind them that my trade routes are mine alone. Don't touch the chiefs themselves, they're more useful alive. But their guards should be cut down for a clear show of force.
data.6663149196a9349baa021baa failMessageText: I told you not to touch the bosses themselves! I need to intimidate them, not take them out.
data.6663149196a9349baa021baa successMessageT: Done? Good, now everyone will think twice before getting into my sales network.
data.666732298477f79f3f6ea229: Eliminate any Scav Boss guards without killing the Bosses
data.66631493312343839d032d22 description: The "entrepreneur" was dealt with, but there are still people in town who bought my product bypassing me. Remember the toxin cultists? That's them. Leave the fanatics a message from me. Let them know there's only one Fence in this city. You do that, and I'll make sure you receive something special.
data.66631493312343839d032d22 successMessageT: You found all their circles? After a job like that, you've definitely proven you can be trusted. Here you go.
data.666733e0c62a5c652f3c4b45: Stash a Cultist knife at the sunken village marked circle on Shoreline
data.666733e3f2c2969cf600991b: Stash a Cultist knife at the Health Resort east wing marked circle on Shoreline
data.666733e565831d5bafa18bbb: Stash a Cultist knife at the river village marked circle on Woods
data.666733e7430c8972d6a5f438: Stash a Cultist knife at the sawmill marked circle on Woods
data.6663149cfd5ca9577902e037 description: Hey, bro. My friendly competitors are poaching my customers. If they want to declare a trade war on me, then my answer has to be very serious. I found out how they transport their goods. They hire guys with big backpacks. Take care of those mules, will you?
data.6663149cfd5ca9577902e037 successMessageT: Sick! That's how trade issues should always be dealt with.
data.66696cd3997231debad40d19: Eliminate any target that is using a 20+ container size backpack
data.6663149f1d3ec95634095e75 description: You really gave me a hand with those mules back then. Now everything seems to be ready for retail, but there's not enough momentum to revitalize our economy. Let's show this town how to market!
data.6663149f1d3ec95634095e75 successMessageT: Now that's more like it! Thank you, brother.
data.666973ee1d80fbbbfeaf46c9: Sell Ragman any backpacks or tactical rigs
data.666314a1920800278d0f6746 description: Got another job for you, brother! I see the demand for backpacks, can't lose profit now. I've only got basic backpacks, so I need to bring in some exclusive items. That'll bring in more customers. You know what I mean, right? If you get some really rare rigs  and backpacks, I'll be in your debt!
data.666314a1920800278d0f6746 successMessageT: You know what? These thingies are so good I'm gonna measure them and produce them myself. They're gonna sell out instantly!
data.666977f2dd6e511e9f33005a: Find the Crye Precision CPC plate carrier (Goons Edition) in raid
data.666977bfe975ac480a8f914e: Find the Mystery Ranch NICE COMM 3 BVS frame system (Coyote) in raid
data.66697774640ec1284ed1621f: Find the LBT-1961A Load Bearing Chest Rig (Goons Edition) in raid
data.6669769ff0cb253ff7649f27: Find the Crye Precision AVS plate carrier (Tagilla Edition) in raid
data.666314a31cd52e3d040a2e76 description: Look what my guys made! The rigs look like a perfect match, but they still need to be tested. If you can beat the local hotshots with them, then it's a good product.
data.666314a31cd52e3d040a2e76 successMessageT: So, how was it? No stiffness, no tearing? Then maybe I can increase the price a bit... Oh, right, here's your reward, you're a life saver!
data.6669abb8dac5788ebd0ff74a: Locate and neutralize any Scav Boss (Excluding the Goons) while using any Goons Edition tactical rig
data.666314a50aa5c7436c00908a description: We did a great work together with the new gear line! Just like back in the old days when business was booming and cash was rolling in. By the way, I got an idea for a special cut to make pants pockets bigger. You want me to try it out on yours? Then you'll have to pay for them. The patterns are pretty old and expensive. You can't do that from memory!
data.666314a50aa5c7436c00908a successMessageT: Beautiful. Alright, pants off right now, time for an upgrade!
data.666314b0acf8442f8b0531a1 description:
What's up, warrior. I've been talking to my nephew about some video game where you shoot demons. I thought I'd give him a little present. 

Anyway, here's the task: get me a double-barrelled shotgun like in that game, and make it look real nasty! Oh, and make the barrel shorter.
data.666314b0acf8442f8b0531a1 successMessageT: It really is a beast! Even I'm now interested in seeing this game...
data.66632cf3fbd7dedfa6153a9f: Modify an MP-43-1C shotgun to comply with the given specifications
data.666314b2a9290f9e0806cca3 description:
Warrior! Remember the DB you were building? I couldn't deliver it past the border. That's a bummer, the shotty is gorgeous. Speaking of, we've got plenty of demons of our own in Tarkov. 

Can't even take a shit in the woods at night! Why don't you take this gun out for a spin and deal with those devils?
data.666314b2a9290f9e0806cca3 successMessageT: How'd it go? We really should add something like that to the inventory... I think it's gonna be a big hit!
data.66632deea5607d352f3aa844: Eliminate the hooded men while using the double barrel shotgun
data.666314b4d7f171c4c20226c3 description:
Hello again! Remember the good old time when all the major fighting took place at Polikhim? People were buying tons of gear from me back then. There was a kit, the most popular among PMCs. 

I was wondering how it performs in the field nowadays. Check it out for me and tell me how it is, yea?
data.666314b4d7f171c4c20226c3 successMessageT: Thanks for your help, soldier! Nowadays, there's battles all over the city, and everyone's got their own different equipment. It's an arms race, I'll tell you that!
data.666333e93962787efd64004a: Eliminate PMC operatives while using Colt M4A1, 6B43 body armor, and Kiver-M helmet on Factory
data.666314b696a9349baa021bac description:
Good afternoon. I've learned that сomrade Prapor has become nostalgic lately. Although I can't find time for such things myself, your and Prapor's affairs have brought me to a good idea. 

When the locals found out about TerraGroup's underground laboratory, there was quite a stir! It was a breakthrough for my business, the lab is where I got my unique equipment from. 

Well, there may still be some original American leftover LEDX from back then. Can you get me one of those? It would really help our cause.
data.666314b696a9349baa021bac successMessageT: My thanks to you. I don't know what we'd do if the lab wasn't accessible to people like you.
data.6672e47f25ab92726912c3e5: Locate and obtain the special version of the LEDX Skin Transilluminator in The Lab
data.666314b8312343839d032d24 description:
Hello, friend! You know how even small changes affect our isolated Tarkov world. Take, for example, the arrival of the humanitarian aid that's being dropped from airplanes. 

Even I couldn't get some of the components for my work before. But now you can find real treasures in these crates! 

By the way, I'd like to arrange for a new package. To do this, I need to make sure that the pilots work as instructed, give a drop right after the launch of the red flare. Can you help me with that?
data.666314b8312343839d032d24 successMessageT: It worked, right? Thanks, friend. Our airmail comes in so handy!
data.6672edebec0c3e2ad7d4e489: Launch a red signal flare at the old sawmill on Woods
data.666314bafd5ca9577902e03a description:
The factory run was amazing, your stories made my memory come flooding back! The gunfights are one thing, but when the bandits' leaders showed up, that's when it got real hot. 

Reshala was the first to show up, always bragging about his gold TT. Back then, everyone wanted one of these in their holster. 

But now, for some reason, the demand for TTs is going down. Can you remind everyone what kind of weapons real men fight with?
data.666314bafd5ca9577902e03a successMessageT: Older models always have a kind of personality to them. And this one, the gilding, the grip... Something about it just feels right, doesn't it?
data.6663389aa257916ad3c89529: Eliminate any target while using the golden TT-33 pistol
data.666314bc1d3ec95634095e77 description: Sup, bandit! How's life? A little birdie told me there's a special magazine in the Ultra mall at the Interchange. They wrote about our Russian video game, which is recognized all over the world! I guess the guys really came up with a great concept!
data.666314bc1d3ec95634095e77 successMessageT: Now this is a victory! The magazine hit the jackpot! Looks like real historical shit.
data.667a958eb30fe2e2938a6387: Locate and obtain the special edition of the gaming magazine on Interchange
data.666314bd920800278d0f6748 description:
Hello, soldier. I've met some rookies recently, here in Tarkov. They say people don't watch everything on tape anymore, they watch it live! Programs, stories, and some even show their everyday life non-stop. 

They even said a bunch of civilians are watching Tarkov's activities live! It seems that the whole world is interested in our city!

I don't understand how they organized the broadcast to the outside world, but I wouldn't mind a second pair of eyes. It's a simple task - organize surveillance in some spots, and I'll return the favor.
data.666314bd920800278d0f6748 successMessageT: I think I'm beginning to understand why people watch these "live streams". It's addictive!
data.666757c530b9b77ff2d9ac58: Найти жесткий диск с утечкой в покосившемся доме на локации Берег
data.667bf8370849ce7edf2b124e: Install a WI-FI Camera on the mountain ledge on Woods
data.667bf840981b1c594af358ce: Install a WI-FI Camera at the pier tower on Shoreline
data.667bf845dc371ee9869f185e: Install a WI-FI Camera at the office corridor on Factory
data.666314bf1cd52e3d040a2e78 description:
Hey! Remember the client with the game magazine? I have a new order. I need a data disk, it's all related to the same game. Some scam artist said that the people who created the game had stolen user data from 2 million accounts! And as proof he showed a hard drive to everyone, allegedly with this leak. But the publishers are serious guys, they would not allow such bullshit. So the client is looking for the drive to clarify the situation.

My guys said the drive should be in an old wooden house near the health resort, there is a toilet on the left and a rag above the entrance.
data.666314bf1cd52e3d040a2e78 successMessageT: Lemme see. Ha, it's a blank! Yeah, the publishers turned out to be smooth guys, and trust me, this allegations kid will be forgotten by everyone.
data.666759f6742e5c250f2065fe: Найти жесткий диск с утечкой в покосившемся доме на локации Берег
data.667571ad6889d3af44af7be2: Locate and obtain the hard drive at the old house on Shoreline
data.666314c10aa5c7436c00908c description:
Hello there. I know some people, a documentary crew. They want to make a movie about Tarkov. They're risk-takers, but I can't change their minds. So I figured I'd better help them get it done quickly and stay alive. 

Equipment for them was also dropped from the airplane you called in, but the hardware is fragile and was partially damaged during the landing. Can you help me find replacement parts?
data.666314c10aa5c7436c00908c successMessageT: Great, thanks for your help! The cameramen said they've already come up with a title for the movie — "Raid". Sounds good, don't you think?
data.66675a4567c0cf0989946e12: Hand over the found in raid item: SSD drive
data.66675a50f15c3daac1fcb57d: Hand over the found in raid item: USB Adapter
data.66675a5b89c89dbbf90361d5: Hand over the found in raid item: Portable Powerbank
data.66675a66e7b6dbc6ff88de91: Hand over the found in raid item: Rechargeable battery
data.667c252898eab887725ef789: Hand over the found in raid item: PC CPU
data.667c25452c353b0176f883d1: Hand over the found in raid item: Electronic components
data.667c257562774a862480925c: Hand over the found in raid item: Bundle of wires
data.667c25970b2c3c93bfc0f204: Hand over the found in raid item: Capacitors
data.667c25a8b3d49a2e3f4bd05c: Hand over the found in raid item: NIXXOR lens
data.667c25b7b4419ddadbe352be: Hand over the found in raid item: RAM stick
data.667c25eeb3fba3b8f07b9193: Hand over the found in raid item: Working LCD
data.667c26159bd3d32fb565578e: Hand over the found in raid item: Light bulb
data.666314c3acf8442f8b0531a3 description:
You're a good guy, I'll tell you that. I wouldn't trust another man to do this, but you're an experienced fellow, you understand what I'm saying. I heard that Prapor is now into modern technology, and he's got cameras everywhere, watching everything from his man cave. 

And recently he ruined one of my deals, started yelling like a damn rooster, something about the rules of trade and military order... We have to show him what a motherfucker he's become. Oops, sorry for the offensive language. Hope it doesn't disrespect your community guidelines.
data.666314c3acf8442f8b0531a3 successMessageT: Well done! They say that even the outside world found out about our little move, haha!
data.667442da875be5fb415df535: Stash a Golden rooster figurine at Prapor's WI-FI Camera on Woods
data.6682873d755938fa4cb73073: Stash a Golden rooster figurine at Prapor's WI-FI Camera on Shoreline
data.66828746efaecf435dde20ca: Stash a Golden rooster figurine at Prapor's WI-FI Camera on Factory
data.666314c5a9290f9e0806cca5 description:
How's it going, brother? I heard the city's stirring up, collecting souvenirs, reminiscing over old times. And I just got a lead on something like this. They keep these things in museums. 

In the old days, each city had its own key, which the governor received at the time of establishment. I even saw one on a tour when I was a kid!

They don't do that anymore, but Tarkov does have its own key, apparently! When the city was laid out, they made one for historical reference. And I know where to find it! If you bring it back, we'll make a fortune.
data.666314c5a9290f9e0806cca5 successMessageT: You got it? Nice! What do those numbers mean? Only the bright minds who know about Tarkov's history will understand that, probably.
data.66675abf3763d2d5e42654b4: Найти Ключ от города на локации улицы Таркова
data.6679884cef969161e3e9d64d: Locate and obtain the souvenir key to the city on Streets of Tarkov
data.6672d9def1c88688a707d042 description: Hello, mercenary. You want to take our cooperation to the next level? You know the greater the responsibility, the more important the trust. Prove your dependability.
data.6672d9def1c88688a707d042 successMessageT: Well, now we can talk about your job.
data.6672ec2a2b6f3b71be794cc5 description: Good afternoon. I desperately need the staff keycards from the TerraGroup laboratory, and you know full well how impossible it is to get even one of those. I heard that Mechanic is willing to trade the cards for some military equipment, but I lack the manpower to gather it currently. This is a matter of life and death. Will you help?
data.6672ec2a2b6f3b71be794cc5 successMessageT: Thank you! I don't know how or where you got them, but now I can get the equipment that will surely delight my cust— Ahem, patients, of course. These cards are the key to salvation no less!
data.66742f90653d4d410e6908ea: Hand over a TerraGroup Labs access keycard
data.66742f71f4a5f593020a5554: Hand over a TerraGroup Labs keycard (Violet)
data.66742f60da136c794ff6df0c: Hand over a TerraGroup Labs keycard (Yellow)
data.66742efcb6a664c20e32cc11: Hand over a TerraGroup Labs keycard (Red)
data.66742ebfbe505da164e5068d: Hand over a TerraGroup Labs keycard (Green)
data.66742eb113141dd347c1515f: Hand over a TerraGroup Labs keycard (Blue)
data.66742e9871a1ea849356d1a1: Hand over a TerraGroup Labs keycard (Black)
data.668bcccc167d507eb01a268b description:
Hello, I'll bring you up to speed. Apparently Peacekeeper and comrade Prapor are trying to re-divide the weapon market. They're both dumping to win customers from each other. Rings a bell, doesn't it? History always repeats itself, and we are in yet another page of the book with this arms race...

Well, whatever, no point in rambling now, plus this situation could prove beneficial to me. I was just about to restock my supply of imported weapons. I heard that even the Scavs at Polikhim have tuned western guns now! Can you get me some of those? I don't think anyone will mourn these bandits.
data.668bcccc167d507eb01a268b successMessageT: Hmm, that's odd... I thought Peacekeeper only sold quality product. The condition of these guns would make many people consider switching to another seller.
data.668bcf4e734d42388944ccf5: Hand over the found in raid western Scav weapons
data.668bccf963acb16d63707043 description:
Hello, my friend. You've likely already heard rumors about my merchandise, yes? My guess is this Russian prick just can't stand the fact that the customers are choosing me over him. Or perhaps there's a new player trying to join the competition. 

In any case, this reputational damage must be dealt with immediately. Bring me some of this "poor-quality merchandise", and I'll look into it.
data.668bccf963acb16d63707043 successMessageT: What the kurwa is this... That's not my product! Well, thank you for your work anyway. Now I have several leads, but we need to figure out where these weapons came from.
data.668bd013696575b3bbc846ec: Hand over the western Scav weapons with very low durability
data.668bcd1b194be70f18427a00 description:
Oh yes yes my friend, you are just in time! I conducted an investigation and found the source of the faulty weapons. Turns out Prapor had nothing to do with this. The imported guns in this condition and quantity are only available to those ex-USEC bandits. It seems they've decided to join the market themselves. 

However, they can't sell their goods on their own for obvious reasons, meaning they must have accomplices... You need to set up surveillance at their base so we can find their dealers.
data.668bcd1b194be70f18427a00 successMessageT: Great! Now I'm gonna track down the dealers who have been discrediting me. After that, I'll contact you for your next job.
data.668be8a88b5800f44b533e21: Install a WI-FI Camera to watch the first water treatment plant building entrance on Lighthouse
data.668be8dfd906438a21fc839c: Install a WI-FI Camera to watch the second water treatment plant building entrance on Lighthouse
data.668be8e5ed860032551c901f: Install a WI-FI Camera to watch the third water treatment plant building entrance on Lighthouse
data.668bcd253e2c5f65cc64d7da description:
So, the cameras worked just right. The ex-USECs are receiving help from the Svavs, and my man was able to ID them. They're two of Kaban's men, Gus and Basmach. I'm not certain if their boss knows about this side gig, but now is not the time to look into it. 

The reputational damage is already too high, and I need to take these two fucks down, ASAP. An old rival of mine has decided to take advantage of the situation, so we have to work fast!
data.668bcd253e2c5f65cc64d7da failMessageText: So you're refusing to help me? Protecting these Scavs on Prapor's orders? I won't forget this, mercenary.
data.668bcd253e2c5f65cc64d7da successMessageT: Excellent work. These two flew too close to the sun, am I right? Well, time to restore my good name.
data.668bd044fd212b5f7ca0d830: Eliminate Basmach on Streets of Tarkov
data.668bd0c04fd3b3f3aa50c893: Eliminate Gus on Streets of Tarkov
data.668bcd367eb38c3c4d58603c description:
Heyo, warrior! I heard about our western colleague and his so-called "investigation". The USEC deserters decided to sell used guns and got in touch with the Scavs. They say it were Kaban's boys who set Peacekeeper up. Trouble for him, but huge profit for me! 

The only problem is that he found out about Gus and Basmach, and now he wants to take them out. Listen, I don't really like those thugs, but they're very useful to my business. Be a good lad, go help those boys out, will you?
data.668bcd367eb38c3c4d58603c failMessageText: You're sabotaging my operation here, kid. Was it import jeans or fucking soda you sold out for?
data.668bcd367eb38c3c4d58603c successMessageT: PK didn't spare resources to get those two, didn't he? But you've done well. I knew you'd help me out. After such an embarrassment, the tourist will take a long time to recover. The two boys seem to have good ambition, they'll go far, I'm telling you! All they need is to get out from under Kaban.
data.668be97f77ef4d66357d6393: Eliminate PMC operatives on Streets of Tarkov
data.668be9bfd999e5485ead4306: You must not kill Gus or Basmach while the task is active
data.668f9ec2f575f0ed515f8cc6: Do not kill Gus or Basmach while the quest is active
data.668bcd6c3e2c5f65cc64d7dc description: This is it, warrior! It's time for the decisive breakthrough in this arms race! Peacekeeper is in a vulnerable position, so we have to take him down for good. Show that there's nothing in Tarkov that's better than our domestic guns. I think you know full well how to demonstrate the quality of Russian weapons.
data.668bcd6c3e2c5f65cc64d7dc successMessageT: You really showed them! Now everyone knows who to buy a reliable weapon from. I wonder how Gus and Basmach will fare from now on.
data.668bd364b3a107338354ae8f: Eliminate as many targets as possible while using Russian weapons
data.668bcd7459a35c28386482d0 description:
Good day to you! So, we have dealt with the cause of the negative rumors, but rumors still run through the city. And then there's that old soldier still campaigning his business. He thinks he can beat me in this fight. 

Let's prove to him that he can't. The advantages of imported weapons are obvious, and you must demonstrate them in action. It's time for a good show, my friend!
data.668bcd7459a35c28386482d0 successMessageT: Spectacular. Once again you've proven that you work for result. Now everyone knows who to visit for the highest quality and innovative products.
data.668bd3adf0ede1e7c0a18eb5: Eliminate as many targets as possible while using Western weapons
data.669fa38fad7f1eac2607ed46 description:
Hello, dear friend. There's an important job just for someone like you. You need to pick up a journal from the TerraGroup field lab at the Polikhim factory and drop it off at a specified location. It's at an old sawmill in Priozersk nature reserve. Leave the package at the house with transformers. 

I don't want to upset my influential customer, so I can't trust a random person with the job.
data.669fa38fad7f1eac2607ed46 failMessageText: Are you sure you did the right thing, mercenary? My client won't stand for it, and I'd recommend you look over your shoulder more often from now on. Don't count on me for protection.
data.669fa38fad7f1eac2607ed46 successMessageT: Great! You know the saying "What happens in Vegas, stays in Vegas"? Everyone has their secrets, and prying into those secrets might be too dangerous...
data.669faeb6a6e02d00c47ad812: Locate and obtain the lab journal on Factory
data.669faecceb01bf6324de66c4: Stash the journal at the old sawmill on Woods
data.669fa3910c828825de06d69f description:
Hello. I understand that you were tasked with finding the laboratory log from the polychemical plant. Apparently, TerraGroup is willing to pay handsomely for the extraction of their documents. 

I urge you to reconsider. If the corporation cares so much about this material, it must be hiding something valuable! Obviously, I mean valuable to the city and its citizens. Just leave the journal in my care.
data.669fa3910c828825de06d69f failMessageText: You've decided to return the journal to the corp? You don't seem to care much for the people of this town. I'm disappointed in your choice.
data.669fa3910c828825de06d69f successMessageT: You picked the right side! This journal will be very useful to my acquaintance in his experiments.... I mean, research! This way we can alleviate the suffering of the Tarkov citizens who are still in the city.
data.669fa394e0c9f9fafa082897 description:
Hello, friend! How are you doing? Things are going well for me here. Sometimes it even seems too good to be true. Well, can't complain though!

I can't play Tetriz in the old warehouse anymore, so I've found a new, bigger playground. But there's no machinery! 

I want to build myself a forklift from what's left in the factory. There should be enough surviving parts for one. You don't have to collect parts, just route my men through all the forklifts.
data.669fa394e0c9f9fafa082897 successMessageT: I didn't realize there were so many forklifts at the plant! I remember the times I spent all day with my father in the garage working on his Volga...
data.669faf99963982aef42a5ba4: Locate the first forklift on Factory
data.669fafa09a13dcb8bf66e6bd: Locate the second forklift on Factory
data.669fafa1d0fe63abcf15fac8: Locate the third forklift on Factory
data.669fafa2394f7353883ffd8d: Locate the fourth forklift on Factory
data.669fafa49bf4b277e24f3681: Locate the fifth forklift on Factory
data.669fafa5f597899ad6bc55bb: Locate the sixth forklift on Factory
data.669fafa76172f63531f6e74d: Locate the seventh forklift on Factory
data.669fafa9299830ffe78e937d: Locate the eighth forklift on Factory
data.66a80f20fe47046136f14c8b: Locate the ninth forklift on Factory
data.66bd67615936a4753b7345be: Locate the tenth forklift on Factory
data.66bd6765b9e77d3672edfeee: Locate the eleventh forklift on Factory
data.66c2331d75e8aa67fbf65930: Locate the twelfth forklift on Factory
data.669fa395c4c5c04798002497 description: Hey, so I've noticed that more and more people are sneaking around at the chemical plant, it's getting a little crowded for my taste... That's why I need you to scout out a new exit route in case shit goes down, you know. If you do that, you can count on a magnificent reward, trust!
data.669fa395c4c5c04798002497 successMessageT:
In the backyard, huh? A lot of people tried to go through there before, but they got blown up by tripwires too often. But you're telling me there's not a single old mine left? 

Well that's good! Just don't talk about our new hidey hole too much, okay? By the time the suckers find out about this exit, we'll have looted the factory clean!
data.669fb12eb01ceef19a5b4ebc: Survive and extract from Factory through the main exit
data.669fa3979b0ce3feae01a130 description:
Haven't seen you in a while. I was just talking about you with my friend, talking about clever youth...

He told me a story about some amateur soldiers who went raiding into the old tunnels. One got spooked by a noise and started shooting everywhere, another one threw a bad grenade and killed everyone in their group. Turns out my comrade didn't even need a tripwire in the end. Disappointing, he said.

If you don't want to find yourself in a similar situation, take a shotgun and go to those tunnels at the chemical plant. If you can handle the enemy in such conditions, then cramped space will become your ally.
data.669fa3979b0ce3feae01a130 successMessageT: Alive and well, I see? Well, now you're the apex predator in those dungeons.
data.669fb1ffe34e78d618792b41: Eliminate any target in the old cellars while using a shotgun on Factory
data.669fa399033a3ce9870338a8 description:
Hey, warrior! You've probably seen a crashed chopper at the factory before, yeah? I wonder when and how it ended up there. But I know one thing for sure: they never sent helis to Tarkov to pick up anyone, neither before nor now. We should find out who was on that helicopter and what was their mission.

You should go scout that heli. There's gotta be a logbook or something.
data.669fa399033a3ce9870338a8 successMessageT:
Haha! I knew you were the right merc for the job. The helicopter doesn't appear to be Russian, but that's only at first glance. It looks like our undercover operatives infiltrated the USECs and captured one of them!

If there are no bodies near the helicopter, it means that the boys managed to escape, and the task was accomplished.
data.669fb4a56e66d3d79183a5c9: Locate and obtain the helicopter logbook on Factory
data.669fa39b91b0a8c9680fc467 description:
I don't understand why nobody notices the obvious patterns in the platinum price change. We're facing a total crisis but I'm the one they're calling pessimistic! Well, let's see how they buy up platinum at the overprice.

By the way, we have old heat exchangers under the plant, they have those old corrugated tubes from Soviet times with platinum inserts in them. At times like this, you always want to be prepared for a possible crisis.

Can you help me stock up? Just mark the heat exchangers with strobes.
data.669fa39b91b0a8c9680fc467 successMessageT:
You sure you didn't miss any? Alright, good. Still, it's a shame that complacency prevents some investors from seeing real change. 

Everyone will then say that the platinum crisis took everyone by surprise and could not have been predicted... Yeah, right.
data.669fb647a5be751be095da27: Locate and mark the first heat exchanger with an MS2000 Marker on Factory
data.669fb64aa7e974b27a9c7e1f: Locate and mark the second heat exchanger with an MS2000 Marker on Factory
data.669fb64b5150ba5196dae347: Locate and mark the third heat exchanger with an MS2000 Marker on Factory
data.669fa39c64ea11e84c0642a6 description:
You got here just in time, man! I remember you helped me a hell of a lot with surveillance in the suburbs. 

And now there's all this commotion at the chemical plant, I bet you're well aware of it! Be a true pal, arrange some eyes for me there too, yea?

I've seen some cranes there, they would be a perfect place for a camera. Alright, chop chop.
data.669fb5c58c03e61e1a33ddf0: Install a WI-FI Camera in the first crane's cockpit on Factory
data.669fb5c7d5fbaaa7b285e83d: Install a WI-FI Camera in the second crane's cockpit on Factory
data.669fb5c9d798aa41b9bd60b5: Install a WI-FI Camera in the third crane's cockpit on Factory
data.669fa39ee749756c920d02c8 description:
Hello, young man. I've received information that one of the tank containers at the Polikhim chemical plant has been damaged. Judging by the description of the liquid inside, it doesn't look like any of the emulsions declared in the official documents.

I think the substance in the tank could be hazardous, so I'm asking you to get me a sample as soon as possible. This is the only way we can be sure of our assessment of chemical safety in Tarkov.
data.669fa39ee749756c920d02c8 successMessageT: Excellent! I've already found a specialist to look into this subject. Your contribution to the safety of the city is invaluable!
data.669fb6c859bdae826f7325d4: Take a sample of the chemicals from the damaged tank container on Factory
data.669fa3a08b4a64b332041ff7 description:
Hello, soldier. Everyone seems to be flocking to Polikhim, running around looking for secrets... I found out something interesting, too. It turns out that the TerraGroup fucks had their own warehouse in the basement for extra important cargo, and there's a vial of some rare nasty stuff in there.

You know what's gonna happen when people find out about this. One will ask to retrieve it, another will try to intercept it. Now imagine it falls into the wrong hands. It's best if you and I take this stuff before anyone else and keep it under wraps. The job's important. Will you help me?
data.669fa3a08b4a64b332041ff7 successMessageT: You're a good kid. My comrade will find a good stash spot for this thingie where no one will ever find it.
data.66a0e692281e56a89b717b7d: Locate and obtain the chemical container at the TerraGroup warehouse on Factory
data.669fa3a1c26f13bd04030f37 description:
Hey. I have partners who are interested in the condition of the equipment at the Factory. Not just any TerraGroup equipment, but ordinary reactor mixers, of all things! Guess the guys have found some use for them. I trust them and would like to help them. Let them at least try to carry out their plan. 

According to my information, the mixers themselves are intact, but the engines above are probably out of service. I know you're capable of doing this, and you've come to my rescue many times. So will you help me again?
data.669fa3a1c26f13bd04030f37 successMessageT: Is everything working now? Great, I'll pass the news on to my, uh, mechanics.
data.66a0e7581ad4ff329a13ebc8: Fix the first reactor mixer with a Toolset on Factory
data.66a0e75bd9cb07ea69e018c7: Fix the second reactor mixer with a Toolset on Factory
data.66a0e75df6e0911101eed474: Fix the third reactor mixer with a Toolset on Factory
data.669fa3a3ad7f1eac2607ed48 description:
Together with you we have come a long way on the trail of the mysteriously deceased inhabitants of Tarkov. 
Now I have new information.

The bodies of workers at the factory were found without signs of violence. It could be a symptom of poisoning or worse... Blood samples would help shed light on the mystery of these workers' deaths. We can't take that chance.

You already have good experience in collecting samples, so I'd like to entrust this case to you.
data.669fa3a3ad7f1eac2607ed48 successMessageT: Do you have the samples? All right, let's carefully move them over here... There seems to be no connection to epidemiological risks. But the blood texture is quite different than expected, so this must be somehow influenced by TerraGroup!
data.66a0f391676953651bd8b796: Locate the dead worker and take their blood sample on Factory
data.669fa3a40c828825de06d6a1 description:
Here you are, warrior! It's been a while since you and I did some good old gun testing, huh?

I got a new one, albeit imported. Lightweight, easy to handle. That's something our guns sometimes lack.

We need to test this beast in close quarters within kissing distance, hehe. Factory would be perfect for this. Let me know how it goes.
data.669fa3a40c828825de06d6a1 successMessageT: How's it feel, easy to aim? Does the silencer get in the way? Okay, I'm convinced. Only a fool would turn down a good weapon.
data.66a0f5a7f9eae6761253114c: Eliminate any target while using an IWI UZI Pro on Factory
data.66a1a806bd092031693a6e25 description:
Hello. So looks like a group of Scavs managed to enter that underground lab people have been talking about. Apparently, they were looking for some secret room, but the Raiders stopped them. Now everybody's searching this Lab for that room, and somebody even unlocked the main entrance to the facility.

And I'll tell you this: if the room was hidden even from their own staff, then there was definitely something incredibly dangerous going on there. I have a really bad feeling about this, so I ask you to stop the curious bandits. There are many other places to scavenge, right?
data.66a1a806bd092031693a6e25 successMessageT: I knew I could count on you. You saved the city from another conflict. We shouldn't be digging into the shady dealings of these "scientists", nothing good comes out of it.
data.66a1a8db0b2909ec8990395a: Eliminate PMC operatives in The Lab
data.66a74c628410476dd65543be description: Hello, friend. Things have been a little bumpy for me lately. I will be temporarily raising the prices of my products and services from today until I can solve some pressing matters. A mercenary friend of mine is putting together a team to raid the underground lab, and he needs reliable firepower. Can you help? I see you know as much about the ARs as I do, so I thought I'd entrust this to you. I need an M4A1 with no more than 300 total recoil and ergonomics no less than 70. Not easy, I know. Now, be sure to put an EOTech XPS 3-0 on it, since the client refuses to use any other scope.
data.66a74c628410476dd65543be successMessageT: Many thanks. I think this will keep me on track for some time.
data.66a74c628410476dd65543c2: Modify an M4A1 to comply with the given specifications
data.66a75b44243a6548ff5e5ff9 description:
Thanks for the help with the M4, you really helped me out. Unfortunately, this mercenary never transferred the payment he promised me. I trusted him because of old acquaintances, but the guy went straight to the lab as soon as he received the weapon, and so far there is no word from him. Got too greedy, that's my guess... Well anyway, I can deal with this matter later, but I also have something else on my mind.
I'm collecting feedback on my services, looking for a fresh perspective, you know? I've decided not only to do individual orders, but to sell guns in sets, fully loaded out of the box. Test it out properly, ask your colleagues maybe. Every little detail and view point is important! And be sure to check the weapons in action, I'm sure you know how....
data.66a75b44243a6548ff5e5ff9 successMessageT: Hmm, I see. Pretty much what I expected, of course. Yet I still need more feedback... Anyway, I'll be in touch.
data.66a76d45acbbf739afad1fea: Eliminate any target while using 5.56x45 caliber weapons
data.66a76d693cda803a9788be30: Eliminate any target while using 5.45x39 caliber weapons
data.66a76daa3a883f3481e56b96: Eliminate any target while using 7.62x39 caliber weapons
data.66a76efbe0a0eb89847ac586: Eliminate any target while using 7.62x54R caliber weapons
data.66a76fb52a58ea63fbb62d67: Eliminate any target while using 9x19 caliber weapons
data.66a76fc57a265a8879856491: Eliminate any target while using 9x39 caliber weapons
data.66a77394243a6548ff5e601d description: I've talked to other mercs and sketched out the general picture for future sales. Thanks for your opinion, too. Unfortunately, the problems aren't diminishing. Just a couple days ago, some drifters cut off my long distance communication channels to my suppliers. I'm gonna need some wire, mainly power cables. I'm willing to buy them from you right away.
data.66a77394243a6548ff5e601d successMessageT: Excellent, I'll never forget this! I'll send your colleagues to fix my cables. Things are getting better, aren't they? Here, another present for you.
data.66a77394243a6548ff5e6021: Find a Military cable in raid
data.66a78dada472ad7f845b71f7 description: Judging by the latest news, the situation in Tarkov cannot be called stable. We have to make do with what we have. However, I have a unique proposition for you. A new phase of the conflict is about to develop. History repeats itself in cycles, and my predictions never fail me. I have just received a good shipment of all kinds of stuff, and thanks to you, I can finally breathe freely. I've decided to invest in a major market research. Just like the last time, I need you to use your favorite weapon, but now you'll be wearing a special tracker that will help us stay in touch. I've recruited some of your other colleagues to do the same. The most popular weapons will be put on sale. If it works out well, I'll even try to get a discount on the rest of the stuff. So, you in?
data.66a78dada472ad7f845b71f7 successMessageT: Thank you, man. Stay in touch.
data.66a794ca1b3fe087d0a96ea3: Eliminate PMCs with your favorite weapon
data.66aa58245ab22944110db6e9 description:
Greetings, mercenary. My partners desperately need to transport something important through the center of the city. You know how isolated the neighborhoods are and how dangerous the main roads are. You'll need to scout the route from the TerraGroup headquarters to the Rodina movie theater.

My men have recently seen the Scavs who found a shortcut between the neighborhoods. It appears to be an old route used by USEC units during the Contract Wars. It was used for most of the supply runs, the soldiers even called it the Suez Canal amongst each other.

This path will allow you to visit several different locations in one raid. Find it and make sure it's safe.
data.66aa58245ab22944110db6e9 successMessageT:
Amazing, you've found it! Hopefully it'll be just as safe by the time the convoy leaves.

However, I don't understand how they were able to restore the road. The road was blocked by the collapsed Paradigm Shipping building, which is when supplies were cut off. Few people have the resources to clear such a wreck.

Apparently, someone is very interested in organizing easy routes...
data.66aa5b2cecad9c067780924b: Scout the intersection of Mira Ave and the overpass on Ground Zero
data.66aa5bb281dff8466b076894: Locate the passage leading to Streets of Tarkov on Ground Zero
data.66aa5be8035c6a410dc570b2: Use the transit from Ground Zero to Streets of Tarkov
data.66aa5c88c085db7d8158db4a: Scout the road on Primorsky Ave on Streets of Tarkov
data.66aa5c8ba8c36eaef492ef92: Survive and extract from Streets of Tarkov (or transit to the next location)
data.66b0e57eddc25d8d17e3e3c0: Scout the area round the Rodina cinema on Streets of Tarkov
data.66aa61663aa37705c5024277 description:
Came here just when I needed you! I found a new delivery route across the city. Well, not exactly found it, per se. Someone moved a package from the city center to Ultra twice as fast as usual.

These guys must have found a veteran guide who's been here before all the electronics were shut down... Maybe even someone like this crazy guerilla mushroom guy, you heard of him? He'd show up out of nowhere, even been taken captive. But he always found a way to get out and lose his pursuers.

Either way, we need to take control of the route. Find the place where those smugglers emerge from, and show everyone that this is now Ragman's route! So yeah, go ahead and scare everyone off in the city and near Ultra.
data.66aa61663aa37705c5024277 successMessageT: I think we got the wrong guys, man. Someone came by and told me that this route is used by some very important people. Should've thought this through...
data.66aa61663aa37705c5024278: Eliminate any target on Streets of Tarkov
data.66aa61663aa37705c502427c: Use the transit from Streets of Tarkov to Interchange
data.66aa74571e5e199ecd094f18 description:
Been waiting for you, friend. My workers found a rare ultrasonic thickness gauge at the customs warehouse, along with some equally useful equipment. There's nothing better that can give me that kind of precision in my measurements!

I can't risk it, so I'm trusting you with this recovery mission. Pick up the package at Customs and deliver it to the designated point at Polikhim. There's something I've been wanting to test for a while... Wait, you didn't know about the industrial area shortcut?

I used it back when I worked at Polikhim. It was the only way to get equipment to the plant that would otherwise be stuck in customs for months. 

A fellow forester showed me this path. He said that people were afraid to pick mushrooms near the plant, so it was always full of good pickings.
data.66aa74571e5e199ecd094f18 successMessageT: You didn't lose anything along the way, correct? All right, then it's time to send the engineers out to do some measurements, we're about to find out what these factory walls are hiding. Thanks for your help, friend.
data.66aa74571e5e199ecd094f1b: Use the transit from Customs to Factory
data.66ab97a5c74ce045d6c32578: Locate and obtain the precision tools package in the laboratory on Customs
data.66ab97d56cb6e3bfd7c79fbc: Stash the package at the laboratory storage room on Factory
data.66ab970848ddbe9d4a0c49a8 description:
Salutations! An important assignment has just come from the high-ups. Top priority and all that jazz. There's a path from Priozersk to the Reserve base, and our guys need communication in those parts urgently.

The path? Ah well, I'll share it with you, but make sure nobody else knows about it! When the Contract Wars were in full swing, some artisan managed to lay a path parallel to our road. We tracked the guy down and started interrogating him on who he was working for, what kind of mission he was on, you know the drill. 

We thought we'd captured a spy! Yet he kept calling himself a mushroom picker and grinning like a moron. We wanted to send him to headquarters. But at night our mushroom picker disappeared, no one saw him again after that.

So, with your help, we'll build a communication line along this path, and you'll be responsible for the equipment. You'll deliver a part of it to the place, go to the Reserve base, and leave the second part there.
data.66ab970848ddbe9d4a0c49a8 successMessageT:
Your country will be proud of you, soldier! 

But the fact that the Scavs started roaming around this path worries me a bit... Someone must be scouting for all the forgotten shortcut routes on Tarkov's map.
data.66ab9c5c60199cdb0902f8cc: Stash a Military cable in the specified place on Woods
data.66ab9c78e192b852d889e2bf: Stash a Bulbex cable cutter in the specified place on Woods
data.66ab970848ddbe9d4a0c49ab: Use the transit from Woods to Reserve
data.66ab9c914a7cba3ea786ce58: Stash a Military cable in the specified place on Reserve
data.66ab9c7ea3a7219e87d4b75e: Stash a Bulbex cable cutter in the specified place on Reserve
data.66ab9da7eb102b9bcd08591c description:
Hello. I used to walk many a footpath myself, but time has bested me. The looters have cleaned out all the popular places, and now they're heading into the forests. 

I saw some of those Scavs the other day. They were dragging something through the swamp near Azure Coast. Even before the war, people used to call this place a death trap. Only I and my mushroom picker friend knew how to cross it in one piece and survive.

Would you scare those bandits away? Make them know the forests are not for them to ravage. Make sure you cross that path I mentioned too, clean it for good.
data.66ab9da7eb102b9bcd08591c successMessageT:
The forest likes quiet, we can't let them destroy such places. 

I don't know how they could have found out about this trail... My friend has never shown his paths to bad people.
data.66ab9da7eb102b9bcd08591d: Eliminate Scavs at the village on Lighthouse
data.66ab9da7eb102b9bcd08591f: Use the transit from Lighthouse to Shoreline
data.66ab9da7eb102b9bcd085922: Eliminate Scavs at the village on Shoreline
data.66aba85403e0ee3101042877 description:
Good afternoon. I have received information that somewhere under the city there is an abandoned entrance to the Laboratory. 

Apparently, TerraGroup has converted one of the old bomb shelters into an emergency exit from their lab. This presents us with a unique opportunity to acquire all the precious equipment we need with minimal risk! 

However, I cannot send my people out without reconnaissance, it would be too dangerous. It's better to have someone experienced check this passage first and make sure the areas of interest are secure. Will you help us?
data.66aba85403e0ee3101042877 successMessageT: So you have found it indeed. Excellent! How's the passage, is it safe? In a state of disrepair, you say? Well, it seems like this opportunity won't be with us for long. I'll send my men as soon as possible.
data.66aba85403e0ee3101042878: Locate the passage leading to The Lab on Streets of Tarkov
data.66aba85403e0ee310104287a: Use the transit from Streets of Tarkov to The Lab
data.66aba97b1000025218c82ea8: Locate the passage leading to Streets of Tarkov in The Lab
data.66b090f5723e7bbe8b518ca8: Scout the server room in The Lab
data.66b0910951c5294b9d213918: Scout the hazard dome in The Lab
data.66b10eef0951e90ec383850b: Scout the control room in The Lab
data.66abb019f5ca239a1006258b description:
Hello my brother in crime! We got some real action coming up, you hear about the new trails? Mister Fence is planning to set up a real network, and he need a little help from our end.

Here's the plan: I'll give you the locations, you mark them. Think of it as strolling around the city and enjoying the beautiful places.

You, however, will take the less known paths. Nobody's been there since the Contract Wars, probably. You'll be thanking me after such a trip!
data.66abb019f5ca239a1006258b successMessageT: You done with the sightseeing? Fucking great, mate! Oh, by the way... Is it true what they say about this mushroom picker wandering through the swamp at night?
data.66abb07983e00cd68c493b93: Mark the passage to Streets of Tarkov with an MS2000 Marker on Ground Zero
data.66abb07f5186167dc936b545: Mark the passage to Interchange with an MS2000 Marker on Streets of Tarkov
data.66abb081f95aebc762e59c21: Mark the passage to Streets of Tarkov with an MS2000 Marker in The Lab
data.66abb0869dfc42f39dae135b: Mark the passage to Customs with an MS2000 Marker on Interchange
data.66abb087ce20f2d428c52435: Mark the passage to Factory with an MS2000 Marker on Customs
data.66abb0895ffee6d7968d3f4c: Mark the passage to Woods with an MS2000 Marker on Factory
data.66abb08bf51ed35fd1af9b6f: Mark the passage to Reserve with an MS2000 Marker on Woods
data.66abb08f50fe485b45cb5d6e: Mark the passage to Lighthouse with an MS2000 Marker on Reserve
data.66abb0918d26bf2c9da1507e: Mark the passage to Shoreline with an MS2000 Marker on Lighthouse
data.66b0fc1ee4b718b3f29d2e49: Mark the passage to The Lab with an MS2000 Marker on Streets of Tarkov
data.66abb32aeb102b9bcd088d5f description:
Hello, mercenary. You must have heard about the "new" routes between the city and its suburbs. 

In reality, they've been around since the Contract Wars. All we had to do was validate and network them. Later on, I'll open it up to the public: less people will want to get their hands on my goods in popular places.

But right now, I need to move one shipment across the city, pronto. You'll lead the way to secure the path for my men in dangerous areas. 

I've already got some of the routes under my people's control, so they can transfer your things to your Hideout or patch you up during the transit.
data.66abb32aeb102b9bcd088d5f successMessageT: The buyer has told me everything is in place. You've earned your reward, and you can expect my men to help you on the new trails.
data.66abb32aeb102b9bcd088d62: Use the transit from Ground Zero to Streets of Tarkov
data.66abb39bf1d97b9b55390a79: Use the transit from Streets of Tarkov to Interchange
data.66abb3aae25c1c539ab84870: Use the transit from Interchange to Customs
data.66abb3ac416b26ade4a1446c: Use the transit from Customs to Factory
data.66abb3bf228ace5ca9f3d745: Use the transit from Factory to Woods
data.66abb3c546296c1d3abd4ec5: Use the transit from Woods to Reserve
data.66abb3ca1925053c0493f8b0: Use the transit from Reserve to Lighthouse
data.66abb3d0b87953519dc5e04b: Use the transit from Lighthouse to Shoreline
data.66b38c7bf85b8bf7250f9cb6 description:
Hello there. I see you've become very confident in your survival skills. That's what gets people killed. Overconfidence weakens your senses, and Tarkov doesn't tolerate it. 

I was talking to an old comrade of mine, and let me tell you, trpwires are the ultimate test of alertness. Partisan has driven a great many bastards out of existence, and most of the time it was only a matter of catching the enemy inattentive. Yes, his methods are extreme, he's been like that since Afghanistan.

Even if you're on my friend's good side, there are still plenty of "gifts" in Tarkov even without him. Not just in the woods, too. Sometimes even a random room can come with an explosive surprise. That's why I advise you to cut down on your eagerness and take a closer look at such places. 

You'll live longer if you learn to recognize mortal danger.
data.66b38c7bf85b8bf7250f9cb6 successMessageT: Would you look at that, you're alive! While you were gone, I've prepped this little thingie for you, so you can learn the secrets of booby trapping on your own. Consider it a homework assignment, but just make sure to not blow yourself up.
data.66b38c7bf85b8bf7250f9cb7: Locate the heavily mined area on Woods
data.66b38de6a97d8cbafd711846: Locate the Claymore mine on Ground Zero
data.66b38e144f2ab7cc530c3fe7 description:
Come on in. So, how's your tripwire business going? No luck? Figures. This isn't like mindlessly shooting everyone. You've got to have a sense of intuition and know where the prey's gonna be. If you were a hunter, you'd understand.

Try watching where the bandits hang out. Think about where your wire would catch the bastard off guard and how to conceal it. Take your time, use your best judgment. 

Only then will your hunt be fruitful. Come back when you find at least a couple good spots. I wouldn't be so quick to set these tripwires around, otherwise you'll kill some of your teammates by accident.
data.66b38e144f2ab7cc530c3fe7 successMessageT:
Good job, you found some decent spots. Tripwires demand a specific approach, and now you're starting to get the hang of it. Come back if you need another tripwire kit.

Be careful, though! You're not the only one who knows how to set a tripwire, which means every bush, every room, and every rock can kill you. Remember that well.
data.66b38e144f2ab7cc530c3fe8: Locate a good tripwire installation spot on Factory
data.66b38e144f2ab7cc530c3fea: Locate a good tripwire installation spot on Customs
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: Buun, buun. Te-ai descurcat bine, mercenare. Ești liber să pleci.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 description 593: Ah, mercenare, vrei să faci o fapta bună? Clienții îmi cer să le garantez o zona sigură pentru o operațiune specifică secretă. Te-aș numi pe ține, din moment ce ești cel mai competent dintre operatorii locali. Va trebui să observi ce-i în zona și apoi să-mi raportezi. Bafta, mercenar.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: Nu vreau să-mi pierd timpul căutând alt operator. Ești sigur, mercenare, că vrei să mă pui într-o situație dificilă?
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: Bine, cred că-i timpul să te duci. Mulțumesc, tinere.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 description 5c0: Hai înăuntru la niște ceai, tinere. Mă pregătesc să ies la vânătoare azi și mi-ar prinde bine să am niște informații despre zona. Poți să mergi să verifici? Rămân dator.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: Mda, știi, în timp ce-ți explicam situația, am văzut în ochii tăi că nu prea ești hotărât dacă vrei sau nu misiunea. Ce neplăcut, va trebui să caut alt om pentru treaba asta.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: Undă verde deci? Treaba bună, soldat.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 description 54c: Ah, luptător. Ascultă, am nevoie de ajutor cu observarea unei zone - va trebui să faci o plimbare prin niște locuri, să vezi care-i situația acolo, poate găsești niște cai de scăpare. Nu pe gratis - vei primi răsplată, desigur. Bun, fă-ți bagajul, vom aștepta vești de la tine.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: Cum adică refuzi? Soldat, soldat... folosește-ți căpățână: cine va apăra Patria dacă nu tu? Mai gândește-te o dată.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: Bun, aici e harta, arată-mi ce-ai găsit. Bun, o să le transmit clienților. Mulțumesc, prietene.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 description 5a7: Mercenare, ai un minut? Am pregătit o comandă pentru clienți, dar vor să le garantez că punctul de întâlnire e sigur. Dacă n-ai altă treaba, le poți găsi o ruta? Găsește o intrare sigură și o cale de ieșire, mă înțelegi? Mulțumesc, rămân dator.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: Mare păcat. Am ținut special să-ți cer ție să faci misiunea asta... Chiar a început să-mi placă să lucrez cu tine. Nu te grăbi să refuzi totuși, ok? Poate se schimbă lucrurile.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: Deci, cum e situația? Buun, totul merge bine atunci.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 description 583: Vino-ncoa, domu' operator, să vorbim. Cum ești, băiete, ocupat? Nu ești ocupat deci. Am nevoie să cercetezi o zona că să-mi meargă treburile bine. Mergi și vezi care-i situația, bine? Nu vreau că oamenii mei să se bată cu nimeni. Deci da, hai înapoi când ai terminat. Voi fi aici.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: Ce, te-ai căcat pe tine? Mă gândeam că n-ai coaie pentru treaba asta. Bine, dacă ești așa pizdă, îți dau altceva de făcut.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: Minunat, frate! N-am să uit asta!
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 description 5ac: Salut, frate, am niște lucruri de rezolvat. Sunt niște băieți pe care vreau neapărat să-i întâlnesc ca să discutăm niște chestii, dar băieții ăștia sunt foarte timizi și nu vor să se bage în mizeriile mele. Mă poți ajută cu treaba asta? Caută-le doar o ruta sigură pe unde să nu-i deranjeze nimeni. Bun?
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: Uite ce mofturos. "Pe asta o fac, pe asta nu". Adineaori te bucurai la orice misiune tip "găsește și predă" pe care ți-o dădeam. Mă, nu te uită la mine de parcă mint!
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 description 54c: Salutări, tinere. Angajații mei au de livrat niște loturi de medicamente valoroase, dar sunt precaut și nu vreau să-i trimit singuri fără să știu dacă ruta e sigură. Dacă ești disponibil atunci te rog să ne ajuți, pentru binelele civililor. Trebuie doar să cercetezi zona și să asiguri că au trecerea liberă. Te bagi?
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: Tinere, nu-i momentul să iei decizii în grabă. Gândește-te puțin, cântărește opțiunile. Totuși nu zăbovi prea mult - treaba e urgentă, altfel va trebui să caut un angajat mai bun dacă mă refuzi.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: Aici erai! Ai la tine tot? Treabă bună.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 54c: Salut, hai înăuntru. Ști cumva de un loc magic în care găsești întotdeauna ce ai nevoie? Am o comandă pentru niște bunuri, și n-am nici cea mai mică idee unde să le găsesc. Vrei să mă ajuți? Pentru o recompensă, evident.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: Cum adică refuzi? Soldat, soldat... folosește-ți căpățână: cine va apăra Patria dacă nu tu? Mai gândește-te o dată.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 593: Bună ziua. Am o comandă pentru niște bunuri pe care Căștile Albastre nu le pot obține. Dar, te avem pe tine, mercenare, și abilitățile tale, va fi floare la ureche pentru tine. Aici ai lista de bunuri. Nu mă dezamăgi.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: Nu vreau să-mi pierd timpul căutând alt operator. Ești sigur, mercenare, că vrei să mă pui într-o situație dificilă?
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: Mulțumesc, băiete, bună treabă. Uite, pentru deranj.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 5c0: Salut, tinere. Am cam rămas fără provizii, pentru magazin, pentru mine. Mă poți ajuta? Așteptă aici, îți fac o listă. Mulțumesc.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: Mda, știi, în timp ce-ți explicam situația, am văzut în ochii tăi că nu prea ești hotărât dacă vrei sau nu misiunea. Ce neplăcut, va trebui să caut alt om pentru treaba asta.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 5a7: Salut, mercenar. Ascultă, am o comandă pentru diferite provizii, dar nu le am pe toate în stoc acum. Aș fi extrem de recunoscător dacă te-ai duce să faci rost de ele pentru mine. Aici ai lista cu toate informațiile. Mulțumesc.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: Mare păcat. Am ținut special să-ți cer ție să faci misiunea asta... Chiar a început să-mi placă să lucrez cu tine. Nu te grăbi să refuzi totuși, ok? Poate se schimbă lucrurile.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: Aici e săgeata! Te-ai descurcat bine omule.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 583: Vreo să cauți niște bunătăți? Trebuie să fac rost de niște lucruri, dar toți oamenii mei sunt prinși cu treburi mai importante. Tu, în schimb, abia aștepți să ajuți un prieten! Hai'ncoa, să-ți fac o lista. Spor la treabă.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: Ce, te-ai căcat pe tine? Mă gândeam că n-ai coaie pentru treaba asta. Bine, dacă ești așa pizdă, îți dau altceva de făcut.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: Ah, ce jucător, gata să sară în ajutor!
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 5ac: Salut, frate. Am o listă plină cu bunuri speciale de livrat, iar clienții tot așteaptă. Poți merge să le cauți și să-ți ajuți fratele Arshavir?
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: Uite ce mofturos. "Pe asta o fac, pe asta nu". Adineaori te bucurai la orice misiune tip "găsește și predă" pe care ți-o dădeam. Mă, nu te uită la mine de parcă mint!
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: Ai făcut o faptă bună, mercenar.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 54c: Bună ziua, tinere. În vremurile astea tulburi, e cam greu să rămâi în abundență, cred că ești de acord. Am primit o comandă pentru niște bunuri specifice, dar nu pot să le obțin. Ne poți ajută, mercenare? Aici ai lista de bunuri.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: Tinere, nu-i momentul să iei decizii în grabă. Gândește-te puțin, cântărește opțiunile. Totuși nu zăbovi prea mult - treaba e urgentă, altfel va trebui să caut un angajat mai bun dacă mă refuzi.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f successMessageT: Treabă bună, prietene! Aici ai plata.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f description 593: Mercenare, asta-i o treabă pentru tine. Căștile Albastre vor fi recunoscătoare dacă reușești să ne întărești relațiile. Este o listă cu niște personaje fără de care afacerea noastră ar merge mult mai bine. Scapă de ei și raportează-mi când ai terminat.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f changeQuestMess: Nu vreau să-mi pierd timpul căutând alt operator. Ești sigur, mercenare, că vrei să mă pui într-o situație dificilă?
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f successMessageT: Deci nu vor altceva decât să se împuște între ei. E greșit. Bine, băiete, știu că ai încercat.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f description 5c0: Știi tu, nu putem curăța singuri Tarkovu de paraziții ăștia distructivi. Dar ce putem face e să le dăm o lecție și să-i lăsăm să-și dea seama de greșelile lor indiferent de cât de inumane sunt. Și dacă bandiții aia nu vor să vorbească - atunci pot să-i trimiți direct în iad.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f changeQuestMess: Mda, știi, în timp ce-ți explicam situația, am văzut în ochii tăi că nu prea ești hotărât dacă vrei sau nu misiunea. Ce neplăcut, va trebui să caut alt om pentru treaba asta.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f successMessageT: Ai eliminat bastarzii? Buun, aici e bonusul tău.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f description 54c: Salutari, soldat, am o treabă pentru tine. Sunt niște idioți cu care nu vreau să-mi mai bat capul. Genul de muncă potrivită pentru tine. Mă poți ajuta? Elimină idioții, stai să-ți dau lista de nume.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f changeQuestMess: Cum adică refuzi? Soldat, soldat... folosește-ți căpățână: cine va apăra Patria dacă nu tu? Mai gândește-te o dată.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f successMessageT: Ești bestial, haha. Bună treabă, aici e partea ta.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f description 583: A ajuns, singurul și unicul! Ascultă, frate, suntem prieteni, corect? Și prietenii la nevoie se cunosc! Așa că hai și ajută-mă - trebuie să le crapi capu' la niște dobitoci, nu pui întrebări, ok? Te bagi?
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f changeQuestMess: Ce, te-ai căcat pe tine? Mă gândeam că n-ai coaie pentru treaba asta. Bine, dacă ești așa pizdă, îți dau altceva de făcut.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f successMessageT: Frumos, frumos. Uite, ia asta, un mic cadou.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f description 5ac: Tre' să fac ceva... Ah, selam, frate. Ascultă, poți să ajuți un frate? Băieții mei s-au băgat în belea cu niște căcănari. Au murit mulți băieți buni, dar cel mai rău lucru, căcănarii aia au furat toate țoalele! Nu pot să-i las în pace acum, corect? Du-te și fă-le felu'.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f changeQuestMess: Uite ce mofturos. "Pe asta o fac, pe asta nu". Adineaori te bucurai la orice misiune tip "găsește și predă" pe care ți-o dădeam. Mă, nu te uită la mine de parcă mint!
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f successMessageT: Gata misiunea? Bun, aici ai plata.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f description 54c: Mercenare, la fix. Avem nevoie de ajutor cu eliminarea unui grup de bandiți care ne încurcă operațiunile umanitare. Dacă nu ești ocupat, atunci îți ofer ție misiunea. Toate detaliile sunt incluse.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f changeQuestMess: Tinere, nu-i momentul să iei decizii în grabă. Gândește-te puțin, cântărește opțiunile. Totuși nu zăbovi prea mult - treaba e urgentă, altfel va trebui să caut un angajat mai bun dacă mă refuzi.
data.616052ea3054fc0e2c24ce6e successMessageT: Ai eliminat bastarzii? Buun, aici e bonusul tău.
data.616052ea3054fc0e2c24ce6e description 54c: Salutari, soldat, am o treabă pentru tine. Sunt niște idioți cu care nu vreau să-mi mai bat capul. Genul de muncă potrivită pentru tine. Mă poți ajuta? Elimină idioții, stai să-ți dau lista de nume.
